title: Suwa Seriya on stand-by for medicine needs
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka’s Health Minister Prof. Channa Jayasumana informed the general public that if they encounter any issues regarding medicines to contact Suwa Seriya service by dialing by 1999.
Director-General of Health Services, Dr. Asela Gunawardana said if a person is not able to purchase a specific type of medicine, one can contact the 1999 hotline for assistance.
The Director-General of Health Services further stated that the patient will be given instructions on where to obtain the required medicines as well as how to obtain them easily.
